name: ext_R5_SubscriptionTopic
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.SubscriptionTopic for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents SubscriptionTopic from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubscriptionTopic|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: The definition of a specific topic for triggering events within the Subscriptions framework
element.definition: Describes a stream of resource state changes or events and annotated with labels useful to filter projections from this topic.

This URL can be the target of a canonical reference. It SHALL remain the same when the subscription topic is stored on different servers.

There is also no expectation that versions are orderable.
